channel.title: Home on Pranav Bhatia
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Pranav Bhatia

item.title: About
item.description:
👋🏻 Hi, I’m Pranav.

I’m a second-year Electrical Engineering student at Punjab Engineering College, Chandigarh. I like to build stuff.

Work #

Most of my work includes building real stuff that have been used by people. As part of the implementation body of the ACM club at my college, I have contributed to various initiatives and developed software that is actively used by students.

I am also passionate about sharing my knowledge and frequently educate my peers about various technologies I have learned. I have also participated in various hackathons, where I worked on innovative projects and collaborated with talented individuals.
